post.description: Fill ai-api-access-token, Referer in the http header. Referer should keep unchanged at any time

parameters.name: refresh
parameters.description: get customer profile from cache or not

200.description: Authorized token, token refresh key, token expire unix timestamp, customer/employee profile are returned

400.description: Invalid expire time format or Must be within 30 days

401.description: The Username and Password don't match.

403.description: AI API call token not present or invalid for login or wrong user type

put.description: Fill refresh key to ai-api-refresh-key in the http header, and ai-api-access-token, Authorization, Referer are also needed in the http header. Http body can be empty

200.description: New authorized token, token refresh key, token expire unix timestamp are returned

500.description: Refresh key invalid or Bad token to refresh, can't get claim or public api access token found but not correct

delete.description: Fill ai-api-access-token, Authorization, Referer in the http header.

parameters.name: device-id, fill a valid device-id when previously token was tighted with a device

200.description: Empty message mean token removed successfully

401.description: You are not authorized to remove this token

parameters.name: docType
parameters.description: The document type of this attachment, like ORDER_ATT, which means order attachment

parameters.name: sourceId
parameters.description: The resource id that the attachment will be linked to, like inspection product id, order id etc.Use comma to concat multiple source ids, like id_1,id_2,id_3

200.description: Uploaded file meta info is returned

get.summary: Download inspection or audit pdf report

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: PDF report file id, for inspection, get it from /user/{userId}/report/{productId}/pdf-info, for audit, get it from /user/{userId}/audit-report/{orderId}/pdf-info

200.description: File binary stream will be returned

parameters.name: password
parameters.description:
Get the confirmation password from "Get inspection order" API, do the following steps to when sending the password:
Step 1: MD5
Step 2: Sha1 on the output of step 1

post.description: If supplier name or identification already exist for a  customer, new creation is NOT allowed

412.description: Supplier name or identification already exist for a  customer

404.description: Can't find related supplier by given supplier id

parameters.name: supplierIds
parameters.description: Separate by comma when need to delete multiple suppliers, values like '123,232,334'

200.description: Return 200 when all given suppliers deleted

parameters.name: continentId
parameters.description: Continent id, get it from API /parameter/v2/continents

parameters.name: refresh
parameters.description: Send false when using server cache is fine

parameters.name: refresh
parameters.description: Send false when using server cache is fine

parameters.name: refresh
parameters.description: Send false when using server cache is fine

get.summary: Search cities from a province by name
Get the lists of available sample levels

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of sample level to return, default is all of them

get.summary: Get inspection PDF report file info

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Inspection product id, please refer to product id returned in /user/{userId}/reports

200.description: File meta info will be returned

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Search keyword matches to Order number or PO number

parameters.name: all
parameters.description: Send 'true' to fetch all sub-master account list under super-master account

parameters.name: sortField
parameters.description: SortField should be one of return columns name

parameters.name: companyRole
parameters.description: If to search report for broker

parameters.name: prodDivision
parameters.description: Division name that this product belongs to in client's company

parameters.name: startSendDate
parameters.description: Search period every time to send and resend report date(format like 2016-12-01)

parameters.name: endSendDate
parameters.description: Search period every time to send and resend report date(format like 2016-12-01)

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Search reports by specific status, it support multi status and split by comma

200.description: Inspection reports search results will be returned

parameters.name: all
parameters.description: Send 'true' to fetch all sub-master account list under super-master account

parameters.name: sortField
parameters.description: SortField should be one of return columns name

parameters.name: startSendDate
parameters.description: Search period every time to send and resend report date(format like 2016-12-01)

parameters.name: endSendDate
parameters.description: Search period every time to send and resend report date(format like 2016-12-01)

400.description: ServiceDate and ShipDate cannot be null, and announceType should be legal

500.description: Error happened when create audit order

get.summary: Get booking details of an inspection

parameters.name: service-type
parameters.description: must be one of psi, clc, pm, dupro, ipc, sp or comma delimited

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
must be a single status value or comma delimited
for open orders: 10,15,17,20,21,22,23,25,30,40,50,56
for completed orders:60

parameters.name: all
parameters.description: supply value as true to fetch all sub-master account orders under super-master account

parameters.name: sortField
parameters.description: Which field used to sort the results, example values orderId,status,serviceType,refNumber,clientReference,supplierName,bookingDate,serviceDate,confirmBySupplier

200.description: Inspection bookings search results will be returned

500.description: Error message and support team's email returned

200.description: empty message if everything is working

202.description: Order created but factory not confirmed

400.description: received data couldn't pass validation, specific field will be given

409.description: Duplicate booking request found and this request is ignored.

500.description: failed to create the booking and error is returned

200.description: successfully receive your request, you can call /booking-result API to check booking result

get.summary: Search async booking result by request id

userType.description: Account type, can be client or employee

tokenExpire.description: Seconds that the token expected to expire, numbers only, must < 2592000(30 days)

id.description: LT order id,only for update order

officeId.description: QIMA user's office Id who is creating the order

submissionType.description: Lab testing Order type, only those values are allowed here:Testing|Quotation

testingLocationId.description: QIMA office's Id which is set to be testing location of this order

reportRecipients.description: Report recipients,whom the test report is sent to,only email address is allowed

invoiceContact.description: Invoice contact,only email address is allowed

quotationContact.description: Quotation contact,only email address is allowed

moduleName.description: Module name of the custom filed data

customFieldDetailId.description: QIMA id of the details of this custom field,which defines this custom filed

turnAroundTimeId.description: QIMA id of turn around time

testId.description: QIMA user's office Id who is creating the order

pricePlan.description: Price plan of this test,this should be aligned to QIMA test data

example: This order is recorded in QIMA
This order is to be booked on 23 03 2023

id.description: Sample collection id, only fro update

sampleCollectionMethod.description: Sample collection method,only those values are allowed here: Sample already sent|Collect from QIMA Inspection|Sample will be sent later

example: This is a sample collection remark

beginShipDate.description: The date sample starts to ship

draftProductId.description: Id of the product id in this booking booking draft

draftId.description: Id of the inspection booking draft

aqlTypel.description: AQL type, can be customized or standard

prodQuantityUnit.description: Unit name of the product quantity, like pcs, sets

orderId.description: Order id of this product in this booking

prodCategoryClient.description: Product category selected by client while booking

prodFamilyClient.description: Product family selected by client while booking

prodType.description: Product type decided by client while booking

isReinspection.description: If this inspection is an re-inspection

prodDivision.description: Division name that this product belongs to in client's company

prodQuantityUnit.description: Unit name of the product quantity, like pcs, sets

otherUnit.description: Unit name of the product quantity if it's not pcs, sets, like pcs

prodApparelCategory.description: Category name when this product belongs to apparel

numberOfReferences.description: How many reference in this product

expectedFinishedPct.description: Percentage of the expected production finished productions for inspection

expectedPackedPct.description: Percentage of the expected packed production for inspection

customField1.description: Product level custom field 1 depends on use case

customField2.description: Product level custom field 2 depends on use case

customField3.description: Product level custom field 3 depends on use case

productId.description: Product id of this product reference belongs to

supplierId.description: Supplier id of this product reference belongs to, if there is more than 1 supplier in this booking

supplierName.description: Supplier name of this product reference belongs to, if there is more than 1 supplier in this booking

customField1.description: Product reference level custom field 1 depends on use case

customField2.description: Product reference level custom field 2 depends on use case

id.description: Id of the supplier in this booking

supplierCode.description: Supplier's identification code in client's system

supplierMGRMobile.description: Mobile phone number of the factory contact

supplierMGRNumber.description: Telephone phone number of the factory contact

supplierMGREmail.description: Emails of the the factory contact

supplierOtherName.description: Name of the alternative factory contact

supplierOtherMobile.description: Mobile phone of the alternative factory contact

supplierOtherNumber.description: Telephone number of the alternative factory contact

supplierOtherEmail.description: Emails of the the alternative factory contact

supplierContinentID.description: Continent id of the factory in QIMA system

supplierId.description: Id of the supplier in client's account

ext1.description: Customer fields 1 of the factory info in this booking

ext2.description: Customer fields 2 of the factory info in this booking

ext3.description: Customer fields 3 of the factory info in this booking

isActive.description: Indicate if this supplier still can be selected for service

id.description: Id of the factory in this booking

factoryId.description: Id of the factory in client's account

factoryCode.description: Factory's identification code in client's system

factoryMGRMobile.description: Mobile phone number of the factory contact

factoryMGRNumber.description: Telephone phone number of the factory contact

factoryMGREmail.description: Emails of the the factory contact

factoryOtherMobile.description: Mobile phone of the alternative factory contact

factoryOtherName.description: Name of the alternative factory contact

factoryOtherNumber.description: Telephone number of the alternative factory contact

factoryOtherEmail.description: Emails of the the alternative factory contact

nbOfWorkers.description: Number of the workers in the factory

isMutiLocation.description: Indicate if this inspection needs to be done in multiple factories

ext1.description: Customer fields 1 of the factory info in this booking

ext2.description: Customer fields 2 of the factory info in this booking

ext3.description: Customer fields 3 of the factory info in this booking

factoryCityId.description: City id of the factory in QIMA system

orderId.description: Order id, primary key of the inspection order

cancelable.description: Indicate currently if this booking can be cancelled

editable.description: Indicate currently if this booking can be modified

isReInspection.description: Indicate if this inspection is re-inspection

followUp.description: Indicate if audit is a follow-up audit, when this booking is an audit booking

originalNbReinsp.description: The original order number if this booking is an re-inspection

reInspectionInstruction.description: The original order number if this booking is an re-inspection

nbOfInspectors.description: Inspectors count assigned to this inspection

prevServiceDateText.description: Previous service date, the value could be "Confidential", date, or a time window.

orderId.description: Order id, primary key of the inspection order

orderPlacer.description: The username of account who placed the booking

status.description: Order status value of the booking, mapping between value and text are 5=DRAFT, 20=WAITING_FOR_VALIDATION, 21=WAITING_FOR_MORE_INF, 25=WAITING_FOR_FEEDBACK, 30=WAITING_FOR_ALLOCATION, 40=WAITING_FOR_INSPECTION, 50=WAITING_FOR_REPORT_VALIDATION, 60=FINISHED, 70=CANCELLED, 80=SERVICE_CUT

statusText.description: Order status text of the booking

serviceType.description: QIMA inspection service type value 1: PSI (Pre-Shipment Inspection), 2: IPC (Initial Production Check), 3: DUPRO (During Production Inspection) , 4: CLC (Container Loading Check), 6: PM (Production Monitoring), 8: SR (Sample Review), 21: SC (Sample Collection)

bookingDate.description: Date of the inspection booking is placed, in format dd-MMM-yyyy

bookingDateUnixTimestamp.description: Date of the inspection booking is placed in unix timestamp

orderNumber.description: QIMA booking order number, like R-Cloud-xx

parentCompanyId.description: Parent company id in QIMA system

allowChangeInspectionDate.description: Indicate if in this order is supplier is allowed to change inspection date

supplierValidateCode.description: Code for supplier to fill when confirming inspection date and location via link in confirmation email

clientRefNb.description: Reference number client can use for referencing with QIMA's inspection booking

expectedInspectionDate.description: Original expected inspection date from client, in dd-MMM-yyyy format

expectedInspectionDateUnixTimestamp.description: Original expected inspection date from client, in unix timestamp format

actualInspectionDate.description: Actual inspection date confirmed with factory, in dd-MMM-yyyy format

actualInspectionDateUnixTimestamp.description: Actual inspection date confirmed with factory, in unix timestamp format

expectedShipDate.description: Original expected shipment date from client, in dd-MMM-yyyy format

expectedShipDateUnixTimestamp.description: Original expected shipment date from client, in unix timestamp format

bookFromPreOrder.description: Previous inspection booking id, need to provide when place re-inspection

copyAllMailTo.description: Email addresses that all email related to order and reports will be copied to

copyReportMailTo.description: Email addresses that all report related to order and reports will be copied to

container20.description: Number of containers (20 inches) - for Container Loading Check (CLC) only

container40.description: Number of containers (40 inches) - for Container Loading Check (CLC) only

container40HQ.description: Number of containers (60 inches) - for Container Loading Check (CLC) only

customField1.description: Custom field 1 depends on use case

customField2.description: Custom field 2 depends on use case

customField3.description: Custom field 3 depends on use case

performInQimaone.description: Inspection perform platform type, 0: Within QSP, 1: In QIMAone from QSP, 2: In QIMAone from QIMAone

key.description: Key name of this system parameter

value.description: Value name of this system parameter

text.description: Displaying name of this system parameter

description.description: Displaying description of this system parameter

createTime.description: Creation time of this system parameter

updateTime.description: Update time of this system parameter

sequence.description: Sequence of this system parameter when under same classification

isAnOrderNotADraft.description: Indicate is this booking is in editing status. Draft means the booking is being edited.

serviceDate.description: Planed inspection date, format should be in dd-MMM-yyyy

shipDate.description: Planed shipment date, format should be in dd-MMM-yyyy

serviceType.description: QIMA inspection service type, mandatory if previousOrderNumber not provided. Here is the mapping, 1: PSI (Pre-Shipment Inspection), 2: IPC (Initial Production Check), 3: DUPRO (During Production Inspection) , 4: CLC (Container Loading Check), 6: PM (Production Monitoring), 8: SR (Sample Review), 21: SC (Sample Collection)

previousOrderNumber.description: Previous QIMA inspection reference R-Cloud number, must provide a valid R-Cloud number if it's re-inspection, example value: R-Cloud-xxxx

supplierCode.description: Supplier's identification code in client's system, mandatory when supplier name, city id, contact not provided, and must be a valid code

supplierName.description: Mandatory when supplier code is not provided

supplierContactName.description: Mandatory when supplier code is not provided

supplierContactPhone.description: Mandatory when supplier code is not provided

supplierContactEmail.description: Mandatory when supplier code is not provided

supplierContinentID.description: Supplier's continent id in QIMA's system, refer to /parameter/v2/continents. Mandatory when supplier code is not provided

supplierCountryID.description: Supplier's country id in QIMA's system, refer to /parameter/v2/countries, /parameter/v2/countries or /parameter/v2/continent/{continentId}/countries. Mandatory when supplier code is not provided

supplierProvinceID.description: Supplier's Province id in QIMA's system, refer to /parameter/v2/country/{countryId}/provinces. Mandatory when supplier code is not provided

supplierCityID.description: Supplier's city id in QIMA's system, refer to /parameter/v2/country/{countryId}/searchCities, /parameter/v2/province/{provinceId}/searchCities or /parameter/v2/country/{countryId}/cities. Mandatory when supplier code is not provided

supplierAddress.description: Mandatory when supplier code is not provided

supplierProductLines.description: Mandatory when supplier code is not provided, get product line from /parameter/v2/product-families API

status.description: Report status value, 30=>Approved by supervisor and diffused to client, 40=>Approved by client online, 50=>Rejected by client online, 60=>Archived by client online, 65=>Archived by client after approval, 70=>Archived by client after rejection

factoryIdCode.description: Factory's identification code in client's system

serviceType.description: QIMA inspection service type value 1: PSI (Pre-Shipment Inspection), 2: IPC (Initial Production Check), 3: DUPRO (During Production Inspection) , 4: CLC (Container Loading Check), 6: PM (Production Monitoring), 8: SR (Sample Review), 21: SC (Sample Collection)

prodDivision.description: Division name that this product belongs to in client's company

prodQuantityUnit.description: Unit name of the product quantity, like pcs, sets

criticalChecked.description: How many product checked for critical level defect checking

majorChecked.description: How many product checked for major level defect checking

minorChecked.description: How many product checked for minor level defect checking

criticalFound.description: How many critical level defect found

majorFound.description: How many major level defect found

minorFound.description: How many minor level defect found

criticalMax.description: Client allowed critical level defects count

majorMax.description: Client allowed major level defects count

minorMax.description: Client allowed minor level defects count

missedInspection.description: Indicate if this inspection is a missed inspection

isReInspection.description: Indicate if this inspection is an re-inspection

read.description: Indicate if client has read this report

expectedShipDate.description: Expected shipment date in unix timestamp

supplierIdCode.description: Supplier's identification code in client's system

sendReportTime.description: send report time.The newest time for sending/resending report

continent.description: Supplier continent id, get it from /parameter/v2/continents

country.description: Supplier country id, get it from /parameter/v2/searchCountries, /parameter/v2/countries or /parameter/v2/continent/{continentId}/countries

province.description: Supplier province id, get it from /parameter/v2/country/{countryId}/provinces

city.description: Supplier city id, get it from /parameter/v2/country/{countryId}/searchCities, /parameter/v2/province/{provinceId}/searchCities or /parameter/v2/country/{countryId}/cities

example: NO.1, A ROAD, B STREET, C DISTRICT

identificationCode.description: Supplier's identifier code in client's system, can be used to link suppliers between QIMA's system and QIMA client's system

mainProductLines.description: Supplier's product lines, get product line from /parameter/v2/product-families API

name.description: Contact's first name plus given name

email.description: Contact's email(s), separate by semi-colon when multiple

s3Url.description: Temporary url of the file on S3

fileType.description: File type in QIMA, describe the file is used for what purpose

version.description: Version of the file, starts from 1

s3Url.description: Temporary url of the file on S3

createDate.description: File creation time in unix timestamp

updateDate.description: File update time in unix timestamp

userId.description: QIMA client id or employee id

validBefore.description: Unix timestamp that the token is valid

refreshKey.description: Key to refresh a token, will extend the token another 24 hours

requestId.description: Request id of the async booking

orderNumber.description: Order number of the async booking inspection

orderId.description: Order id of the async booking inspection

status.description: Status of the async booking inspection
